ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Question for the elder bards
ygData.msgSnippet: The lowest level Krups in OS are level 51. I conned many of them while I was exploring there at level 51. I was able to charm even-con krups, but unable to
ygData.messageBody:
The lowest level Krups in OS are level 51. I conned many of them while I was
exploring there at level 51.

I was able to charm even-con krups, but unable to charm yellow ones. While
level 51 when trying to charm any mob level 52 or higher, I would get that
text feedback that the creature was too high level to be charmed and I still
do, at level 55.


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
> Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Date: Sun, 16 Jul 2000 18:59:27 -0400
> To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Question for the elder bards
>
> aye i can charm some krup frogs too in sebilis and i am pretty sure they are
> all 51+. so i am not sure what the formula is exactly for bravura.
>
> Shada Powa, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr
>
>> At 03:00 PM 7/12/00 -0600, you wrote:
>>> They are lvl 50 so uncharmable by you. The high level charm
>> spell is capped
>>> at 51 or your level whichever is lower.
>>
>>
>>
>> this is wrong, as i charmed a yellow rock golem thingy in the
>> hole at level 51.
>
